name: Readable Column - Debian
description:
The Debian site allows columns of text to be wider than the optimal line length for comprehension and scannability. They are often allowed grow to fill the full width of a browser window.

This style pulls in the widths of paragraphs, list items, definitions and so on to make columns of text which are closer to having the ideal line length.

user.name: ahcox
user.about: Consulting software engineer. Vulkan, Graphics, C++.

css:
@-moz-document domain("debian.org") {
#content > p,
#content > ul,
#content > ol,
#released > div > p,
#unreleased > div > p,
#development > div > p,
body > div.book > div.titlepage > div > div > div > p,
body > div.book > div.titlepage > div > div > div > div > table > tbody > tr > td > p,
body > div.chapter div > p,
body > div.chapter div li,
body > div.chapter div dl > dt,
body > div.chapter div dl > dd,
body > div.sect1 > p,
body > div.sect1 div > p,
body > div.sect1 > div > div.sect3 > p,
body > div.sect1 div.variablelist > dl > dd > p,
body > div.sect1 div.variablelist > dl > dt,
body > div.sect1 ul > li > p,
body > div.sect1 ol > li > p,
body > div.sect1 > div.note > table > tbody > tr > td > p,
body > div.sect1  table > tbody > tr > td > p,
body > div.appendix p,
body > p,
body > ol,
body > ul,
body > dl > dd > p,
body > dl > dt
{
    max-width: 40em;
    
}


}

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.debian.org/doc/manuals/debian-handbook/") {

body > div.preface > div,
body > div.section > div
{
    max-width: 40em;
}

body > ul.docnav.top,
body > ul.docnav.top > li.home
{
    max-width: 100%;
}
}
